summary: NATIONAL RV 2003 TROPI-CAL MOTORHOME.  HAS LEAKED DIESEL FUEL SINCE PURCHASED ON 5/28/03.  FOUR ATTEMPTS TO REPAIR - NONE SUCCESSFUL.  FUEL HAS SATURATED STORAGE BINS AND CHASSIS.  NATIONAL HAS BEEN HARD TO CONTACT AND APPEARS DISINTERESTED IN SOLVING THIS PROBLEM.  WE HAVE MADE NUMEROUS PHONE CALLS AND E-MAILS WITH VERY LITTLE RESULTS.  WE HAVE BEEN UNABLE TO USE OUR MOTORHOME AT ALL AND IT IS A HEALTH AND SAFETY HAZARD.   *JB
